jobs

Interface Job<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a type parameter, T, which represents the result type of the job computation.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EuclideanTspJob, MandelbrotSetJob

    public interface Job<T>
    The Job represents the work to be done from the Client's perspective.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> taskStartTimeMap
      Mapping between a taskId and its start time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T collectResults(Space space)
      Collects results from the Space, composing them into a solution to the original problem.
      void generateTasks(Space space)
      Generates multiple tasks from this job.

    • Field Detail

      • taskStartTimeMap

        static final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> taskStartTimeMap
        Mapping between a taskId and its start time. It is used for experimentation purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • generateTasks

        void generateTasks(Space space)
        Generates multiple tasks from this job. The client decomposes the problem (job), constructing a set of Task objects
        Parameters:
        space - the space

      • collectResults

        T collectResults(Space space)
        Collects results from the Space, composing them into a solution to the original problem.
        Parameters:
        space - the space
        Returns:
        t
